org.arl.fjage.shell

Interface Shell

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConsoleShell, TcpShell

    public interface Shell
    An interface to be implemented by all shells.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Term getTerm()
      Returns a terminal object associated with the shell.
      void println(java.lang.String s)
      Display a message on the shell.
      void start(ScriptEngine engine)
      Starts the shell using the specified script engine.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        Starts the shell using the specified script engine.
        Parameters:
        engine - script engine to use.

      • println

        Display a message on the shell.
        Parameters:

      • getTerm

        Term getTerm()
        Returns a terminal object associated with the shell.
        Returns:
